parameters.name: Plane
parameters.description: Plane or planar face about which to mirror the components

parameters.name: InstanceCount
parameters.description: Number of instances of the components to mirror

parameters.name: ComponentsToInstance
parameters.description: Array of instances of the component to mirror

parameters.name: MirrorCount
parameters.description: Number of components to mirror

parameters.name: ComponentsToMirror
parameters.description: Array of components to mirror

parameters.name: NameCount
parameters.description: Number of filenames for the newly created mirrored assemblies or parts

parameters.name: MirroredComponentFilenames
parameters.description: Array of filenames for the newly created mirrored assemblies or parts

parameters.name: RecreateMates
parameters.description: True to preserve any mates between the selected components if more than one component is to be mirrored, false to not

parameters.name: ComponentModifier
parameters.description: Prefix or suffix for the newly mirrored components if MirroredComponentFilenames is not specified, as defined by swMirrorComponentNameModifier_e

parameters.name: ComponentNameModifier
parameters.description: String to add to the prefix or suffix of the name of the newly mirrored components if MirroredComponentFilenames is not specified

parameters.name: MirroredFileLocation
parameters.description: Name of the folder where to store the file of the newly created mirrored components

parameters.name: CopyCustomProperties
parameters.description: True to copy the custom properties from the selected components to the mirrored components, false to not

parameters.name: Plane
parameters.description: Plane or planar face about which to mirror the components

parameters.name: InstanceCount
parameters.description: Number of instances of the components to mirror

parameters.name: ComponentsToInstance
parameters.description: Array of instances of the component to mirror

parameters.name: MirrorCount
parameters.description: Number of components to mirror

parameters.name: ComponentsToMirror
parameters.description: Array of components to mirror

parameters.name: NameCount
parameters.description: Number of filenames for the newly created mirrored assemblies or parts

parameters.name: MirroredComponentFilenames
parameters.description: Array of filenames for the newly created mirrored assemblies or parts

parameters.name: RecreateMates
parameters.description: True to preserve any mates between the selected components if more than one component is to be mirrored, false to not

parameters.name: ComponentModifier
parameters.description: Prefix or suffix for the newly mirrored components if MirroredComponentFilenames is not specified, as defined by swMirrorComponentNameModifier_e

parameters.name: ComponentNameModifier
parameters.description: String to add to the prefix or suffix of the name of the newly mirrored components if MirroredComponentFilenames is not specified

parameters.name: MirroredFileLocation

parameters.name: CopyCustomProperties
parameters.description: True to copy the custom properties from the selected components to the mirrored components, false to not

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of newly created components VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
